titles.title: Ensuring Efficiency and Fairness in Federal Subcontracting Act of 2024
Ensuring Efficiency and Fairness in Federal Subcontracting Act of 2024
A bill to ensure efficiency and fairness in Federal subcontracting, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
